classmeta.shortdesc: Container for arranging a group of buttons horizontally.

desc.simpara: GtkHButtonBox is a container widget designed for arranging a row of buttons in accordance with a specified GtkButtonBoxStyle setting.

constructor.shortdesc: Creates the basis for a horizontal button container.

desc.para:
The syntax for creating a horizontal buttonbox is:
<?php
$hbuttonbox = &new GtkHButtonBox();
?>
There are no parameters.
desc.simpara: As with all container widgets, no physical space is taken by a GtkHButtonBox until its child widgets are in place.
